description: Blue Star is an amazing plant species. It features gorgeous star-shaped deep blue flowers that bloom in early summer. The foliage is a bright and cheerful green, making an excellent backdrop for the showy bloom. It enjoys a sunny to partly shaded spot, regular water and moderate fertilizer. Its size makes it easy to fit in small gardens and even pots. Once established, it's a tough and hardy species that can tolerate heat and drought, making it a native favorite. Not to mention, it's a great addition to pollinator gardens since it provides food and shelter to beneficial insects. Blue Star is an unbeatable plant making it the perfect choice for any landscape.
